```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(vitae)
library(tibble)
```

# Profile

Short profile text goes here. This template uses tighter margins and black-only fonts for compact printing.

# Experience

```{r}
tribble(
  ~Year, ~Role, ~Org,
  2020, "Scientist", "Example Institute",
  2015-2020, "Engineer", "Example AI Institute"
) %>%
  brief_entries(Role, Year, Org)
```

# Education

```{r}
tribble(
  ~degree, ~uni, ~loc, ~dates, ~details,
  "Ph.D.", "Stats University", "USA", "2020-2024", c("Thesis on Advanced Analytics"),
  "B.S in Biology", "Biology University", "USA", "2016-2020", c("Thesis on Biology")
) %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = degree,
    when = dates,
    with = uni,
    where = loc,
    why = details
  )
```

# Skills

```{r}
tribble(
  ~category, ~details,
  "Analysis", "Statistics, Machine Learning, Data Mining",
  "Programming", "R, Python, SQL",
  "Reserch", "Biology, Genetics",
  "Visualization", "Rmarkdown, streamlit, shiny",
  "DevOps", "Github, AWS, GCP, docker, nextflow"
) %>%
  skill_entries(
    type = category,
    details = details
  )
```

# Honors

```{r}
tribble(
  ~award, ~year, ~org, ~loc,
  "Best Paper1", "2023", "Conference1", "International",
  "Best Paper2", "2022", "Conference2", "International",
  "Best Paper3", "2021", "Conference3", "International",
  "Best Paper4", "2020", "Conference4", "International"
) %>%
  honor_entries(

    when = year,
    with = org,
    where = loc
  )
```

# Publications

